name: Zorktribute
body:
Project.

This is a tribute to Zork, the command line driven game, written on C++.

How to play:

Command controlled game, only text

The orders MUST be written in lowercase

write help to get a list of the commands

There is a map in the root folder to help you

Author

Daniel Huarte

Support or Contact

If you have any doubt/comment, you can contact me at: dhuartel@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
